Mutators

A file containing mutators which are added to Lang.

Mutators
NonZero

Tests for non-nil and non-zero.

Accepts

A number.

Parameters
1

A string which is formatted with the passed number, if the number is non-zero. Defaults to "" (an empty string).

2

A string which is formatted with the passed number, if the number is zero or nil. Defaults to "" (an empty string).

Example

"Slap {DAMAGE|NonZero:for %i damage}" -> Shows "Slap for 3 damage" if 3 is passed for DAMAGE.

"Slap {DAMAGE|NonZero:for %i damage}" -> Shows "Slap" if 0 or nil is passed for DAMAGE.
